channel.title: ::.. Need held of port forwarding..:: Help need, thanks!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/my.php?image=keyportts3.jpg[/img] I think im doing this right not sure :S... Anyway I click on define custom service. It has two choices between, Port Forwarding: 1 Range of Ports Forward a range of WAN ports to an IP address on the LAN
2 Trigger Ports Forward a range of ports to an IP address on the LAN only after specific outbound traffic
I choose option 1...
[IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/my.php?image=keyport2rx8.jpg[/img] This menu appears.
I type fibemanz.no-ip.org for Service Name. My server name. Global Port Range: I type 43594-43594 Base Host Port: I type 43594 (Not sure) I dunno about Protocol but I did TCP. I've done everything else like do the port on firewall, and No-IP still my server is'nt working. Any help

item.title: ::.. Need held of port forwarding..:: Help need, thanks!

item.description:
@davoshanahan wrote:

Yeah that worked[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2007, 08:50:32 AM[/size][hr]Can you check if its online? :O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2007, 10:11:06 AM[/size][hr]Is fibescape.no-ip.org the localhost

Read full topic

item.title: ::.. Need held of port forwarding..:: Help need, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @davoshanahan davoshanahan
item.description:
@davoshanahan wrote:


I think im doing this right not sure :S…
Anyway I click on define custom service.
It has two choices between,
Port Forwarding:
1 Range of Ports Forward a range of WAN ports to an IP address on the LAN

2 Trigger Ports Forward a range of ports to an IP address on the LAN only after specific outbound traffic

I choose option 1…


This menu appears.

I type fibemanz.no-ip.org for Service Name.
My server name.
Global Port Range: I type 43594-43594
Base Host Port: I type 43594 (Not sure)
I dunno about Protocol but I did TCP.
I’ve done everything else like do the port on firewall, and No-IP still my server is’nt working.
Any help

Read full topic
